title: Build a Frontend Framework
description: Learn to build a simple frontend framework from scratch. You'll create a basic component system, rendering engine, and state management.

steps.title: Create a Component Function
steps.description: Start by creating a simple component function that returns JSX-like objects.

steps.title: Build a Render Function
steps.description: Create a render function that can convert your component objects into DOM elements.

steps.title: Add Props Support
steps.description: Extend your component system to accept and use props.
